document.heading: Athletic Field Naming and Sponsorship Amendment Act of 2015

history.narrative: Law 21-68, the “Athletic Field Naming and Sponsorship Amendment Act of 2015” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-340. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Nov. 3, 2015, and Dec. 1, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 17, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 21-233 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-68 became effective February 26, 2016.
